summary: In the late 1980s, a low level gangster named Jackie DiNorscio defends himself in court in what became the longest criminal trial in American judicial history.
cast: Vin Diesel|Alex Rocco|Frank Pietrangolare|Richard DeDomenico|Jerry Grayson|Tony Ray Rossi|Vinny Vella|Paul Borghese|Frank Adonis|Nicholas A. Puccio|Frankie Perrone|Salvatore Paul Piro|Peter Dinklage|Richard Portnow|James Biberi|Chuck Cooper|Oscar A. Valentino Morales|Dennis Albanese|Frank Bonsangue|Rita Branch|Jeff Chena|Dominick Cicco|Tim Cinnante|Marcus Allen Cooper|Mario D'Elia|Vinny DeGennaro|Perry Facchiano|Marshall Factora|James D. Faulkner|John Louis Fischer|Renee Fishman|Paul Gennaro|Chuck Gerena|Rudy Giuliani|Dave Goldstein|Lou Irizarry|Nicole LaPera|Charles LaPlaca|Guy Messenger|Kam Metcalf|Shane Moran|Matt Myers|Joseph O'Keefe|Joe Parascand|Artie Pasquale|Rose Pasquale|Nicolas Quilter|Joe Rosario|Johnny Sanchez|Michalina Scorzelli|Derrick Simmons|Troy Smith|Joseph Tudisco|Vito Violante
title: Declaradme culpable
